Our first iteration is finished and work which is still open needs to be moved into our next iteration. Work which is already finished should still be visible for a project manager so he always has a live state of his iteration.
  • Open "Iteration 3"
  • Set "Start Date" (today), "Due Date" (in 2 weeks) and capacity (40)
  • Add your second requirement which is not yet finished to "Iteration 3"
  • Save Plan
  • Check your moved requirement. Via your "Planned In" attribute you can always see in which iteration or release your requirement was planned.
As you can see all data has been moved correctly. 1 day time spent is already booked on our requirement and your task and defect are on their correct spot.

Hint: If you make changes on plan board in "Iteration 3" these changes will also been done on "Iteration 2". Via your saved historical link you can always go back in time to view you plan how it looked like when it was finished
